createProjectWrapper.name: Create wrapper window
createProjectWrapper.description: Creates a wrapper Window component for the imported UIA project. Only valid for UIA imports.

createIndividualLayers.name: Create a component for each individual layer
createIndividualLayers.description: Creates an individual component for each layer instead of including layer contents in presentation components.

framesPerSecond.name: Frames per second
framesPerSecond.description: Specifies how many animation frames are created per second in animations.
